title: Flip to Shh doesn't vibrate when phone is flipped
content:
In Android pie 'Flip to Shh' have an indication it was On using two quick vibration. After the Android 10 update this isn't happening. The vibration works fine everywhere else. The DND functionality also works when flipped. It's just that the vibration doesn't work any more. 

I even tried to reset my app settings but no luck.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
